name: Meklord Assembly
text:
When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Meklord" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Meklord Assembly" once per turn.
? You can discard 1 card, then target 1 monster you control; destroy it. 
? If a face-up "Meklord" monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 other face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it.
You can only activate 1 "Meklord Assembly" per turn.
